name: Guess the Movie By Frame: Movie Quiz
name_original: Guess the Movie By Frame: Movie Quiz
description:
Do you like movies?

Can you guess the film from the frame?

The rules are simple:
- 1 frame from the film
- 4 answer options
- 3 lives

When a scene from a movie and several answers are shown in the game, then you need to choose one correct option. If the wrong answer is chosen, then one life is burned. In total, you can make mistakes 3 times. After that, you will have to start the game over.

In the game you will find 500 films of various genres, years of release and countries of production. Also contains the latest news for 2020.

Happy passing of the Quiz Show!
